name: Coin Pusher Casino
description:
Coin pusher Casino is a game that brings the excitement of classic coin pusher machines to your computer. With realistic physics and colorful graphics, you'll feel like you're playing the real thing.

In Coin pusher Casino, you'll find multiple gameplay modes to keep things interesting. Test your luck and strategy in timed mode, or relax and unwind in zen mode. For a truly wild experience, try arcade mode where you can collect crazy powerups to boost your game.

With its engaging gameplay and realistic physics, Coin pusher Casino is a must-play for fans of arcade games. So why wait? Download Coin Pusher Casino now and start pushing those coins!

Please note that not all gameplay modes and features are implemented while in early access!

If you love (real) coin pushers, you know exactly why you love them! And that why is exactly this game!
Coinpusher Casino delivers that juicy feeling, of coin stacks and chip towers, loudly crashing down and pusher dumping it all in the loot-shute for you to collect.
Experience the satisfying simulator quality physics of pushing serious piles of coins and rewards for big profits toward you goal.

Play the game the way you like it with Arcade, Classic and Zen mode!

Win credits and upgrade your gameplay with meaningful power-ups from the Perk-Shop!
Collect playable coins and complete your collections.

Features:

- Simulator quality physics
- Multiple unique playable machines and multiple coin setups (and more to come!)
- Arcade mode [action packed game] (not available, but is being worked on)
- Classic mode [classic game with a time limit]
- Zen mode [classic game with no time limit] (not available, but is being worked on)
- A Perk-Shop for power-ups and coins
- Collectibles
- Specials

Perks
- AutoPlay
- AutoCollect
- SkillStop
- Lucky Charms bring you luck
- Insert coin skill
- Hold insert coin


Nice things
- Buy coins like copper, silver, gold and others to play with.
- Uniquely themed machines
- Play with keyboard/mouse or Controller (partially supported while in early access)
